author: openlittermap
title: The Littercoin Stake Pool
description: People are earning Littercoin but the token needs value for retailers to accept it.
solution: The Littercoin Stake Pool will accumulate rewards in a Smart Contract to give each Littercoin value.
experience: 12+ years independent R+D developing openlittermap.com. Littercoin idea born in 2015 after MSc. First funding on Project Catalyst in Fund 4.
